data.name: Freshcart E-commerce
data.description: Freshcart is a comprehensive e-commerce application built using React and Redux. The project aims to provide an easy-to-use and scalable online shopping platform.

data.name: Smaily
data.description: A fully responsive bilingual website built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. Features lazy-loaded images for better performance, smooth Arabic-English language switching, and a contact form that sends data directly to Google Sheets.

data.name: Disney Plus Clone
data.description: This project aims to replicate the Disney Plus website using React and other web technologies. It includes features such as user authentication, browsing movies and shows, and viewing detailed information about each content item.

data.name: Elite Builders
data.description: A modern commercial construction website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to showcase Elite Builders Inc.'s services, projects, and expertise in the construction industry.

data.name: Mealify
data.description: Mealify is a restaurant website project designed using only HTML and CSS. The website has a visually appealing and fully responsive user interface with a list of available meals and contact details for customers.
